name: FoxNews-Maroon
description:
Cleaner page. Maroon background with white text. Work in progress.

Feel free to leave comments and suggestions.
additional_info:
v2.00 - 02/21/2017 - Complete start over from previous version.
v2.01 - 02/24/2017 - Link colors. 
. . .                FoxNews US, Polls: pages and text coloring. 
. . .                Additional Ad Kills.
v2.02 - 02/28/2017 - FoxNews Tech, Science, Health, Entertainment: pages and text coloring.
. . .                Comments Section cleanup.
v3.01 - 09/18/2017 - FoxNews changed entire Main page and some of the subpages.
. . .                 Cleaned out main top ad and "sponsored" ads below.
. . .                 Fixed some coloring (more to be done, but it's a start).
v4.01 - 04/08/2020 - Changed color layout to maroon background. 
. . .                 Most ads are now gone. 
. . .                 Cleaned up comment section.
